column2: A cat person from the far east. Often arbitrary, yet potentially very friendly and supportive.
A cat person from the far east. Often arbitrary, yet potentially very friendly and supportive.

My great grandfather visited the Far East when he was a young man, and returned with my great grandmother. Many said that she was a spirit in human form, and she apparently caused more than one issue that required great grandfather to smooth out due to her not understanding customs. 
  I'm told that it was a full moon the night of my birth, and at first it was believed that my mother had laid with a tiger thanks to my small tail and feline ears. Soon, it was realized instead that I was a rarity, having somehow shown bloodline traits of my great grandmother. 
  While growing up, I found it difficult to find interest in boring things that they kept trying to teach me, and I was told my behavior wasn't befitting a noble on so many occasions. 
  Now fate has somehow put me in charge of my own realm.
